price: Ewe Nabii! Mwenyezi Mungu anakutoshelezea wewe na Waumini walio kufuata.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ حَسۡبُكَ ٱللَّهُ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu ni Mwenye kukudhamini wewe na wenye kukufuata miongoni mwa Waumini katika kila jambo lenye maana kwenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu ḥasbuka al-lahu wamani ittabaʿaka mina al-mu'minīna
